overview_of_class: This course will examine the philosophical contributions of Ludwig Wittgenstein, one of the most polarizing philosophers of the 20th century. We'll examine his views of logic, language, and their limits in his early period. We'll then examine his treatment of mental content, mathematics, and the publicity of languages in his middle period, with an eye toward the transition to his later period. In examining his later works we'll emphasize his meta-philosophical outlook and the continuity of his thought and methods.
name: Special Topics In Philosophy
subject: PHIL
